title: My Ban Appeal
body: okay this is just bs you shouldnt ban someone for flaming their jg without swearing, especially a perma ban i was just stating he wasnt playing properly and he was trolling, i said one bad word compared to him, you souldnt permaban someone who has spent thousands of dollars on their acc too, a 2 week ban at most. plz fix your ban system this is y ur game is dying and refunt my money

replies.body:
but you shouldnt permaban someone for not being toxic
like a 2 week ban for saying stfu kid is fair

> [{quoted}](name=XayahCarry,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=E4fB8dgi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-07-18T09:25:51.758+0000)
>
> but you shouldnt permaban someone for not being toxic
> like a 2 week ban for saying stfu kid is fair

Give full logs, so we can guarantee you deserved it

Or you could just not flame. Why bother, it achieves nothing advantageous.
Being flamed doesn't help you get better or reform, it makes you either mute someone and keep playing your game, or deliberately troll the flamer to make them more angry. Which only negatively impacts the game for the rest of the team.

Dont be so serious, its a computer game. You're not playing for your next meal, or to keep your house or children. If you're not having fun, caused by someone else or not. Don't play.

Or, deal with bad players and enjoy the next game.

Have fun or get out. Flamers deserve what they get

If you want community feedback on a punishment I'd strongly recommend posting your chat logs, as we can't tell you much beyond the generic without knowing what you were punished for.

I will say though that you don't have to swear to be toxic, and swearing isn't inherently toxic. The money you've spent on the game also doesn't entitle you to special treatment. You are judged on your behaviour, not the size of your wallet.

If you've been permabanned for chat you've had at least one previous suspension, with a 14 day ban in there somewhere. It says explicitly in the 14 day ban reform card that any further offences will result in a permanent ban, so you should have been aware that this was a possibility.
Trust me, someone we reported who said 1 bad word didn't get banned at all. 1 bad word is nothing and won't get you banned, obviously you must've been more toxic than the person who was flaming you.

$20 says you were banned because of 3 reasons

1. You shared your account. (pretty obvious)
2. You were beyond toxic, and most likely boasting you would never get banned.
3. You got boosted.


you don't go straight to perma unless one or more of those 3.

get over your denial. stop playing the victim!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

If you wish to appeal the ban, you'll need to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (pick the "I have a question about a suspension or restriction on my account") and go through the process with them.

As has previously been stated, if you wish to discuss the ban here you will need to provide the chat logs, which you would have received in the reform card (in-client) and via the registered email address. Otherwise, we will not have sufficient details about the ban to properly discuss the issue.
